block.p: Tally Last Week in Connecticut, New Jersey and New York.

1. Energy: Vote on an energy bill that includes provisions to encourage fuel efficiency and greater use of corn-based ethanol and other renewable energy sources. It also includes a $15.2 billion package of tax incentives to spur production of oil, coal, natural gas and alternative sources like wind and solar power. Approved 84 to 14, July 31.
Tally Last Week in Connecticut, New Jersey and New York.

1. Energy: Vote on an energy bill that includes provisions to encourage fuel efficiency and greater use of corn-based ethanol and other renewable energy sources. It also includes a $15.2 billion package of tax incentives to spur production of oil, coal, natural gas and alternative sources like wind and solar power. Approved 84 to 14, July 31.
New Jersey Corzine (D): Yea Lautenberg (D): Nay
New York Clinton (D): Nay Schumer (D): Nay
KEY: (A) Absent or did not vote; (P) Present.
